name: Indus Hospital
mission:
Friends of Indus Hospital, Inc (FOIH) is a US-based 501(c)(3) registered charity. We strive to create awareness about the healthcare needs of underprivileged patients and raise funds to provide them with equitable care. By supporting healthcare efforts in Pakistan, FOIH is helping to ensure that vulnerable individuals have access to the healthcare they need, regardless of financial or other barriers.
Through annual fundraising initiatives, community events, and awareness drives, we seek to mobilize a strong tradition of community giving and a shared commitment to changing the paradigm of healthcare delivery in Pakistan.
FOIH is an initiative taken by Americans of Pakistani origin expatriates and supported by a wider community across the USA.
All donations given to FOIH are eligible for tax deduction under US law.
theoryOfChange: By providing free, high-quality healthcare through a network of hospitals, the organization removes financial barriers to medical treatment, leading to improved health outcomes for the underserved in Pakistan.
zakatClaimEvidence: Fulfill your Islamic obligation of Zakat with Friends of Indus Hospital. Donate Now. Friends of Indus Hospital, Inc (FOIH) is a US-based 501(c) (3) registered charity. Your Zakat contributes directly to sustaining free, quality healthcare as 70% of patients at Indus Hospital & Health Network are Zakat-Eligible. Friends of Indus Hospital collects Zakat on behalf of patients treated at Indus Hospital & Health Network. By supporting healthcare initiatives like those at Indus Hospital, Zakat donors contribute to the healing and preservation of life, fulfilling a noble Islamic obligation. (Source: https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQG4y1BRIkBgZlJXTzpd25CICuFllZpKE-58B-C4KnDAPjyhjFrL2VAEdM9U1XhWOkosuiCmBXllT9CUoEUmAi4jGDxdKOC2J6_dmy5OGIs=)

ui_signals_v1.recommendation_rationale: Strong donor fit, low risk profile, and credible supporting evidence for outcomes.

components.evidence: Accepts zakat (+2); Muslim-focused organization (+2); Asnaf: fuqara (+5); Operates in Muslim-majority regions (+3); Strong humanitarian service (+4)
components.name: Muslim Donor Fit

components.improvement_suggestion: Expand services to underserved populations or regions with limited nonprofit coverage
components.name: Underserved Space

alignment.rationale: Alignment 41/50: HIGH Muslim donor fit, humanitarian cause area

components.evidence: No beneficiary data; high program ratio (≥85%) suggests efficient delivery
components.improvement_suggestion: Track and report beneficiary counts to enable cost analysis
components.name: Cost Per Beneficiary

components.improvement_suggestion: Strengthen reserves toward a resilient policy range (commonly 3-12 months), based on revenue volatility and program obligations.
components.name: Financial Health

components.improvement_suggestion: Seek external evaluation or track outcomes for 3+ years
components.name: Evidence & Outcomes

score_details.score_summary: Friends of Indus Hospital Inc shows strong alignment and strong impact, with zakat compliance.

zakat.claim_evidence: Fulfill your Islamic obligation of Zakat with Friends of Indus Hospital. Donate Now. Friends of Indus Hospital, Inc (FOIH) is a US-based 501(c) (3) registered charity. Your Zakat contributes directly to sustaining free, quality healthcare as 70% of patients at Indus Hospital & Health Network are Zakat-Eligible. By supporting healthcare initiatives like those at Indus Hospital, Zakat donors contribute to the healing and preservation of life, fulfilling a noble Islamic obligation. (Source: https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQG4y1BRIkBgZlJXTzpd25CICuFllZpKE-58B-C4KnDAPjyhjFrL2VAEdM9U1XhWOkosuiCmBXllT9CUoEUmAi4jGDxdKOC2J6_dmy5OGIs=)

all_citations.claim: The organization holds a Charity Navigator score of 95.75/100 and maintains a program expense ratio of 86.8%.
The charity is Zakat-eligible and offers specific donation options for neonatal and prosthetic programs.
Total revenue for the period was $14,742,480, with fundraising efficiency at $0.11 per $1 raised and working capital at 1.8 months.

baseline_narrative.amal_score_rationale: The organization earns a strong overall rating due to its high transparency, excellent financial efficiency, and direct humanitarian impact in a high-urgency region.
areas_for_improvement: Relatively low working capital of 1.8 months
Limited geographical diversification of program services outside of Pakistan

dimension_explanations.alignment: There is high alignment for Muslim donors due to the organization's Zakat-eligible status and its focus on urgent humanitarian healthcare needs in Pakistan [2].
dimension_explanations.impact: The charity demonstrates high impact through direct service delivery in specialized areas such as neonatal care and prosthetic limbs, maintaining a high program expense ratio of 86.8% [1][3].

baseline_narrative.headline: Friends of Indus Hospital Inc supports a vital healthcare network providing free, high-quality medical services to underserved populations in Pakistan.
strengths: High financial efficiency with a program expense ratio of 86.8%
Strong fundraising efficiency, spending only $0.11 to raise every $1
baseline_narrative.summary: Friends of Indus Hospital Inc acts as a primary US-based support organization for the Indus Hospital and Health Network, facilitating quality healthcare for patients regardless of their ability to pay [1][3]. The organization is Zakat-eligible, allowing donors to fulfill their religious obligations through various giving methods including neonatal care and prosthetic limb programs [2].
